info.name: Blog
info.description: This is a simple blogging service provide **REST API** for consumer to build their own blogging platform on demand.

item.name: Articles

formdata.description: Accept `author_id` as the primary *id* of author
The `title` field must be between *1-255* chars
The `body` field must be between *1-2000* chars
